scripts.start: npm install && npm run prepare && concurrently "rm -f deno.lock; rm -f ./src/deno.lock; deno run --node-modules-dir --import-map https://dev.cdn.unyt.org/importmap_compat.json -Aqr https://cdn.unyt.org/uix@0.1.x/run.ts --port 80 --stage $APP_STAGE --cache-path /datex-cache --reload -l" "npx tailwindcss -i ./frontend/main.css -o ./frontend/entrypoint.css --watch"
